data.text:
[raw]

Denmark

[/raw]

Below are just some of the Danish Family Names (Danish Surnames) that we have on file. Over the years we would have gathered many more, as well as spelling variations to these.

If you don’t find your Danish Family Name here – we may have it but not have added it to this page yet. You can try our Family Coat of Arms Search page which would be more up-to-date and have more names from Denmark added. On mobile devices it maybe a faster search rather than scrolling through this list.

Any Danish family Names that we don’t have, and the customer has an image or description of it – we can redraw it for them.

Danish Family Names

in alphabetical order

Danish Family Names: A

Abrahamson Acheson Achsel or Axel Adelaer or Adeler Adelsteen Aderen Ahlefeldt Ahnen Akeleie Albertin Albertsen Albretsen Aldenburg Alf Alfsen Algudsen Alkeveder Ampringen or Ambring Amthor Amundsen Ancker Anders Andersen or Andreasen Arbing Arenschild Arenstorf or Arnstorph Aresen Arnesen Arnfast Arnfeld Arnsburg Aslaksen Astrup Axelsen

Danish Family Names: BAAD-BERNER

Baad 1 Baad 2 Badenhaupt Bader Bagge Bagger Balhorn Balsby Bang Banner Bardenfleth Barfod Barner Barnewitz Bartholin Basballe Basse Beck Becker Been Beenfeld Beger Behr Bekis Benderup Benkestok Benner Bennich Bente Benzon Berg Bergen Bering Berner

Danish Family Names: BERHARD-BUTZE

Bernhard Berregaard Biburg Bildt Bille Bing Biörn Biörnsen Bladt Blok Blome Boesen Bolk Borch Bos Botner Boye Brahe Brams Brandt Branner Brask Bratt Braëm Brems Broch Brockenhuus Broersen Brostrup Brug Bruun Bryller Bryske Buch Bugge Busk Busse Butze Bölle Bülow

Danish Family Names: CARLSEN-GRAM

Carlsen or Karlsen Christensen Clausen Clemensen Conrardt-Eberlin Cramer Daae Dahl Dannemand Darr Degn Dehn (Rotfelser) Deichmann Dronning Dyre Eggers Eggertsen Eisen Elbracht Elers Ellemose Ellingsen Engberg Eriksen Eskildsen Falk Felding Finke Fisker Flindt Fogh Foss Frandsen or Frantzen Franke Fredberg Frederiksen or Lövenfeld Friis Frost Fux Gabel Galen Galle Gere Glad Glob Graae Grabow Gram

Danish Family Names: GRANN-JUNGE

Grann Griim Griis Grubbe Grön Grüner Gude Gyde Hansen Harboe Harbou Hase Hatt Hauch Hein Heintz Helt Hennings Henriksen or Hielmstierne Hermansson (Suede) Heye Hoegh Hoff Hoffman Hoffmeister Hogensen Holberg Holck Holk Holm or Holmskiold Holste Holten Hoppe Hübner Ivarsen Jacobsen Jensen or Rosenvinge Jensen Jermiin Jespersen Jessen Johansen or Jonsen Juel or Juhl Junge

Danish Family Names: KAAS-MOURITZEN

Kaas Kabbel Kanne Ketelsen Kieldsen Kingo Klingenberg Knudsen Knuth Kold Kotte Krabbe Krag Krebs Krogh Kruse Kuntze Lachmann Lange Larsen Lasson or Lassen Lauersen or Laursen Lauridsen Lehn Lerche Leth Lichtenberg Limbek or Lembek Lindholm or Linholm Ludke Lund (Swedish Origin) Lunge Madsen Mangelsen Markmand Matthisen Mechlenborg Meyer Michaelsen or Michelsen Moller (Germanic Origin) Moltke Mortensen Mouritzen

Danish Family Names: MUUS-SCHIRACH

Muus Nagel Neergaard or Norgaard Neve Nielsen Norby Nye Olsen or Olesen Olufsen Orm Parsberg Paulsen or Paulson Pedersen or Pedersön Pors Portman Poulsen or Leuenbach Poulson Praetorius Prip Rabe Raben Rantzau Rasmussen or Erasmus Reichau Resen Rheder Roed Rolfsen Rosen Rosengaard Rosenkrantz Ross Rostgaard Rud Rytter Sandberg Sappe Sax Schack Scheel Schirach

Danish Family Names: SCHLEPPEGRELL-ZESKA

Schleppegrell Schmieden Schouboe Schröder Schulin Schultze Schumacher Schönfeld Seefeldt Seehuus or Svanenhielm Sehested Seidelin Serlin Simonsen (Cederfeld-Simonsen) Skaaning Skovgaard or Skov Sparre Sponeck Späth Steeg Steensen Steffensen or Steffen Steinberg Steuben Stibolt Stockfleth Strangesen Stride Struve or Lövenstierne Stubbe Swerin Taysen Teilman Temming Thestrup Thorrissen Thygesen 2 Thygesen Thymen Tideman Tillisch Torkildsen or Rosenstierne Tramp Trette Tuchsen Tönsberg Ulf Unger Urne Urup Vind or Wind Vognsen Wardal Warnstedt Wedel (Wedel-Wedelsberg) Weiberg Werkmeister Wernick Wesemann Wessel Wibe Wilster Winther or Winter Wisborg Wittrup OR Wittrop Worm Zeska

Danish Family Names: NORWAY

Andor (Norway) Bolt (Norway) Gyldenhorn (Norway) Haar (Norway) Hansen or Rosenkrentz Hase (Norway) Henning (Norway) Jonsen Jørgensen (Norway) Kalips Kamp Knag or Knagennielin Krog Lillie Lindstrup Norman Odding Ormsen Ormsson Orning Orre Peders Pedersen Plut Rapp Reichwein Röder Sattler Schack Smör Sommerfeld Sparre Stampe Svale Svendsen or Tordenstierne Thoresen or Thorasen Thorsen Tönsberg Winge

SWEDEN

Swedish Family Names: ADELCRANTZ-BURE

Adelcrantz Adelswärd Adler (d’Adlerberg) Adlercreutz Adlerfelt Ahnen Akerfelt Alströmer Anckar Anrep Armfelt Augstin Axel (d’Axelson) Baltram Baner Barck Barnekow Bennet Berendes Bergenstråhle Beskow Bjelke Björnefelt Bock Bohl Bohm Bonde Born Boye Brahe Brand Brandt Bratt Brauner Bring Brinkmann Broman Brunell Bröms Bure Båhr Böhn (or Böhne or Bohnen)

Swedish Family Names: CARLSSON-HAKANSSON

Carlsson Carpelan Cederström Creutz Cromberg Cronstedt ( anct. Gavelius ) Cronström Dahlberg Delphin Drake (de Hagelsrum) Drakenberg Durell Duvall Düring Eggers Ehrenborg Ehrenheim Engelbrecht Engeström Erdmann Erichsen Ericson Essen (Von Essen) Falck Falkenberg Fitinghoff Fock Forsell or Forselles Forsten Frankelin Fritz Funck Galle Gardie (de la) Gedda Geer (de) Geete Graan Grill Grubbe Gruben Grundel Grys Grönberg Gyllencrutz Gyllenhaal Gyllenstierna Gädda Haar Hammarsköld Hassell Hegardt Hermansson Hermelin Hildring Härd Härleman Håkansson

Swedish Family Names: HINTS-LOWEN

Hintz (de Hintzenstern) Hjärne Hochschild Holk Holst Horn Hulshorst Hök Höpken Jurgenson Kafle Kagg Kalling Kathen Klingenberg Klingspor Knutson Kobes Koch Kochen Konow Krabbe Kruse Krämer Kuhlman Kåse Köhler König Lagerberg Lagercrantz Lagerfelt Lagergren Lagerheim Lagerström Lieven Lilliecrona Lind Lindeberg Lindegren Lindern (Von) Linderoth Lingen Loberg Lode Löwen

Swedish Family Names: LUND-STALMAN

Lund Lundbland Manderström Mannerheim Manstein Marcks Munck Mörner Nordenskjöld Oesterling Ornstedt Otter Oxe Oxenstierna Palmqvist Pauli Pfeiff Philp Pistol Posse Preis Printz Radeke Ramel Rappe Renhorn Reuter Ribbing Robertsson Rosen Rosenberg Rosenblad Rosenbom Rosencrantz Rosenqvist Rudbeck Ruuth Rytter Sabel Sack Schaar Scheffer Scheiding Silfvergren Silfversparre Sjöblad Skjöldebrand Skytte Soop Sparre Spens Stackelberg Stake Starck Stålman

Swedish Family Names: STEDINGK-WRANGEL

Stedingk Stierna Stjernfelt Stjernstedt Stolpe Stromberg Stråle Strömfelt Stubbe Sture Svanfeldt Svanström Svenske Svärd Tamm Tegel Thott Tibell Tigerström Tilas Torstenson Trana Trautvetter Trolle Trotzig Tungel Uggla Ulfsparre Urne Utter Wachtmeister Walkendorf Wasa Weigel Welsk Wernstedt Wetterstedt Wittenberg Wrangel

If you wish to purchase a gift with an Danish Family Name you can visit our online shop. We deliver to happy customers all over the world. International customers from the UK, America, Canada and Australia find that even with Shipping charges added – our products are cheaper than their local suppliers, and delivered just as fast!

The above list contains over 600 Danish family names (Danish Last Names) that we have coat of arms for. These family name coat or arms have been drawn from accurate descriptions and references from only original Heraldry art manuscripts.
